title: Goats
brief_description: A non-narrated film in which the physical appearance and behaviour patterns of a herd of goats are studied. Individual details are featured in close-up. Aspects of goat behaviour are also shown, from the gentle grazing on leaves to the aggressive head-butting of the males. Suitable for upper primary level.
